mathematica: q = 10; Join[{a = 1}, Table[a = (q - n)*a/(n + 1), {n, 0, q - 1}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 09 2011 *)
prog: (Sage) [binomial(10,m) for m in range(11)] [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 21 2009](PARI) a(n)=binomial(10,n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 08 2013(MAGMA) [Binomial(10, n): n in [0..10]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
